column4: Wall St Week Ahead-Nasdaq 100 index may see record with Apple earnings due Tuesday
column5: NEW YORK  Oct 23 The Nasdaq 100 index  dominated by U.S. technology stocks  may set a record high next week  helped by good earnings from Apple Inc expected on Tuesday.

column4: Techs lead Wall St. higher; S&P 500 erases 2015 loss
column5: A tech share rally drove U.S. stocks up sharply for a second day on Friday as earnings from companies including Microsoft beat analysts' expectations  while healthcare shares rebounded from recent losses. | Video

column4: GLOBAL MARKETS-Stocks soar on surprise China rate cut
column5: NEW YORK  Oct 23 Stock markets worldwide soared on Friday after China cut interest rates for the fourth time this year and several large-cap U.S. technology companies reported better-than-expected quarterly results.
